ActJudges Act
SubjectNancy Lieberman ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Samuel Sereth Lieberman**
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to NANCY LIEBERMAN widow of the Hon. Samuel Sereth Lieberman, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, effective September 20, 2012.
